title: Regarding revaluation of ESA results
content: Can we apply for revaluation through online?? when is the last date

comments.body:
Last date is 9th June. I don't think you can apply online as you have to submit the reval form at COE along with payment receipt (generated by pesuacademy).  
Try calling them and ask if they can allow it tho in case you're outside Bangalore.
U can apply online but u won't be able to see the paper , just mail them
